price: 20. Waxay moodaan Axzaabtu inayan tegin15, haddayna axzaabtu imaan (mar kale)16, waxay jeclaan lahaayeen in baadiyaha ay la jiraan reer miyiga oo halkaas ka weydiinayaan wararkiinna; hadday idin dhex joogi lahaayeenna ma ay dagaal galeen in yar ma’ahee.
arabic: يَحۡسَبُونَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابَ لَمۡ يَذۡهَبُواْۖ وَإِن يَأۡتِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ يَوَدُّواْ لَوۡ أَنَّهُم بَادُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ يَسۡـَٔلُونَ عَنۡ أَنۢبَآئِكُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ فِيكُم مَّا قَٰتَلُوٓاْ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
footnotes:
15. Cabsidooda zaa’idka ah munaafiqiinta, kuwaasoo fulayo ah, marka ma rumeystaan in ciidammada cadowga la jebiyey. 
16. Dagaalkii Godka muslimiinta ma gelin dagaal, waayo Alle wuxuu soo diray dabeyl iyo malaa’ig kala firdhisay gaaladii.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yaḥsabūna al-aḥzāba lam yadhhabū wa-in yati al-aḥzābu yawaddū law annahum bādūna fī al-aʿrābi yasalūna ʿan anbāikum walaw kānū fīkum mā qātalū illā qalīlan
